statements: SELECT player_id, avatar_url FROM player_content;
SELECT * FROM player_content WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT avatar_url, timestamp FROM player_content ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, environment_url FROM player_content WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, avatar_url, environment_url FROM player_content WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, avatar_url FROM player_content WHERE avatar_url IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM player_content WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, environment_url FROM player_content WHERE environment_url LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY player_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM player_content GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_records > 1 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp, MIN(timestamp) AS oldest_timestamp FROM player_content;
SELECT * FROM custom_avatars;
SELECT avatar_id, avatar_name FROM custom_avatars WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT avatar_name, avatar_mesh FROM custom_avatars ORDER BY avatar_name DESC;
SELECT environment_name, environment_description FROM virtual_environments WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY environment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_environments WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM custom_avatars WHERE avatar_name = 'Goku'
SELECT player_id, avatar_name FROM custom_avatars WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY avatar_name ASC
SELECT avatar_id, avatar_name FROM custom_avatars WHERE avatar_mesh IS NOT NULL ORDER BY avatar_id DESC
SELECT * FROM custom_avatars WHERE avatar_name LIKE 'A%' AND avatar_mesh != '\x'

SELECT * FROM virtual_environments WHERE environment_description ILIKE '%fun%' AND player_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000','223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001') ORDER BY environment_name
SELECT avatar_id, avatar_name, avatar_model FROM custom_avatars;
SELECT environment_id, environment_name, environment_description FROM virtual_environments;
SELECT player_id, content_type, content_data FROM player_content;
SELECT avatar_name, avatar_model, avatar_id FROM custom_avatars;
SELECT content_type, content_data, player_id FROM player_content;
SELECT * FROM custom_avatars WHERE avatar_id > 100 ORDER BY avatar_name DESC;
SELECT avatar_id, avatar_name FROM custom_avatars WHERE avatar_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY avatar_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_environments WHERE environment_id < 50 ORDER BY environment_name;
SELECT environment_id, environment_name, LENGTH(environment_description) AS description_length FROM virtual_environments WHERE LENGTH(environment_description) > 200;
SELECT content_id, player_id, content_type FROM player_content WHERE player_id = 12345 AND content_type IN ('image', 'text') ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM custom_avatars;
SELECT avatar_name, creation_date FROM custom_avatars ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT asset_type, asset_url FROM avatar_assets WHERE avatar_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, avatar_name, creation_date FROM custom_avatars WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM custom_avatars ORDER BY avatar_id DESC;
SELECT avatar_name, creation_date FROM custom_avatars WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT avatar_id, asset_type, asset_url FROM custom_avatars INNER JOIN avatar_assets ON custom_avatars.avatar_id = avatar_assets.avatar_id;
SELECT avatar_name, theme FROM custom_avatars INNER JOIN virtual_environments ON custom_avatars.player_id = virtual_environments.environment_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING interaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM custom_avatars;
SELECT avatar_name, created_at FROM custom_avatars ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT environment_name, environment_description FROM virtual_environments WHERE environment_owner_id = 12345;
SELECT player_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM player_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT session_name, session_start, session_end FROM game_sessions WHERE game_id = 54321;
SELECT avatar_name, created_at FROM custom_avatars WHERE avatar_owner_id = 1;
SELECT environment_id, environment_name FROM virtual_environments ORDER BY environment_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM player_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') AND activity_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, score_value FROM player_scores WHERE game_id = 2 ORDER BY score_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT session_name, session_start, session_end FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 5 AND session_start BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-01';
